description: This HTML file serves as the front-end interface for a database visualizer or viewer, providing UI components and client-side logic for browsing databases, tables, and viewing data in tabular form.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resetting UI states.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles expanding/collapsing a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and populates the tables list.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data of a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Builds the HTML table for displaying fetched data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates table cell HTML, handling objects, long text, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for better visualization of long or complex data.
